plays.text: Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Tripping Alexei Zhamnov
Penalty to Lyle Odelein 2 minutes for Holding Tomas Holmstrom
Goal scored by Kyle Calder assisted by Andrei Nikolishin and Eric Daze
Goal scored by Jason Woolley assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Brendan Shanahan
Goal scored by Nicklas Lidstrom assisted by Luc Robitaille and Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Alexei Zhamnov 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Kris Draper
Penalty to Boyd Devereaux 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Kyle Calder assisted by Phil Housley and Alexei Zhamnov
Penalty to Andrei Nikolishin 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Luc Robitaille
Penalty to Theo Fleury 10 minutes for Game Misconduct Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Slashing Theo Fleury
Penalty to Theo Fleury 5 minutes for Spearing Kirk Maltby served by Steve Thomas
Goal scored by Kirk Maltby unassisted
Penalty to Dmitri Bykov 2 minutes for Holding Alexei Zhamnov
Goal scored by Sergei Berezin assisted by Steve Thomas and Tyler Arnason
Goal scored by Brett Hull assisted by Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Darren McCarty 2 minutes for Roughing Steve McCarthy
Goal scored by Phil Housley assisted by Kyle Calder and Sergei Berezin
Penalty to Lyle Odelein 5 minutes for Fighting Darren McCarty
Penalty to Darren McCarty 5 minutes for Fighting Lyle Odelein
Goal scored by Nicklas Lidstrom assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Sergei Fedorov
